dynamicFields.remark:
Class 1 :"White collar" staff involved in management and office duties.
Class 2 :"Blue collar" and supervisory staff involved in light manual labor or outdoor salespersons.
Class 3 :"Blue collar" workers engaged in heavy manual labor, with no health or accidental hazard or use of heavy machinery.
Class 4 :"Manual labor including the use of heavy machinery or other occupations with high health or accidental risks. Extra loading is required
